jitsi_title_prefix_description: Text added before the title when identifying a conference call.
jitsi_title_suffix_description: Text added after the title when identifying a conference call.
jitsi_auth_token_description: When enabled, Rocket.Chat will generate a JWT token using the settings below.
jitsi_application_id_description: The app id to use when generating authentication tokens.
jitsi_application_secret_description: The app secret to use when generating authentication tokens.
jitsi_limit_token_to_room_description: If enabled, generated tokens will grant access only to the intended jitsi room.
jitsi_token_auditor_description: The name of the auditor to use when generating authentication tokens.
